The DNS endpoint - CloudFront DNS if using CloudFront else Public ELB DNS name.
[{u'Type': u'A', u'AliasTarget': {u'EvaluateTargetHealth': True, u'HostedZoneId': u'DnsHostId', u'DNSName': u'DnsEndpoint'}, u'Name': [u'', [u'www.', u'WPDomainName', u'.']]}]
The main domain name of the WordPress site (e.g. example.com).
The DNS host zone id - 'Z2FDTNDATAQYW2' if using CloudFront else Public ELB host zone id.
